Class DepartmentMVCTests

java.lang.Object
kp.company.base.TestsBase
kp.company.mvc.base.MVCTestsBase
kp.company.mvc.DepartmentMVCTests
@WebMvcTest(DepartmentController.class) class DepartmentMVCTests extends MVCTestsBase
Application tests for a department with server-side support.
